tokens.description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this pokémon.
tokens.name: bulbasaur

tokens.description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.
tokens.name: ivysaur

tokens.description: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
tokens.name: venusaur

tokens.description: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.
tokens.name: charmander

tokens.description: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.
tokens.name: charmeleon

tokens.description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.
tokens.name: charizard

tokens.description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.
tokens.name: squirtle

tokens.description: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.
tokens.name: wartortle

tokens.description: A brutal pokémon with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.
tokens.name: blastoise

tokens.description: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
tokens.name: caterpie

tokens.description: This pokémon is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.
tokens.name: metapod

tokens.description: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.
tokens.name: butterfree

tokens.description: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.
tokens.name: weedle

tokens.description: Almost incapable of moving, this pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.
tokens.name: kakuna

tokens.description: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.
tokens.name: beedrill

tokens.description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.
tokens.name: pidgey

tokens.description: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this pokémon will fiercely peck at any intruder.
tokens.name: pidgeotto

tokens.description: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as magikarp.
tokens.name: pidgeot

tokens.description: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.
tokens.name: rattata

tokens.description: It uses its whiskers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.
tokens.name: raticate

tokens.description: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.
tokens.name: spearow

tokens.description: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.
tokens.name: fearow

tokens.description: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as pidgey and spearow, whole.
tokens.name: ekans

tokens.description: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.
tokens.name: arbok

tokens.description: When several of these pokémon gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.
tokens.name: pikachu

tokens.description: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.
tokens.name: raichu

tokens.description: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.
tokens.name: sandshrew

tokens.description: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.
tokens.name: sandslash

tokens.description: Although small, its venomous barbs render this pokémon dangerous. The female has smaller horns.
tokens.name: nidoran-f

tokens.description: The female's horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.
tokens.name: nidorina

tokens.description: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.
tokens.name: nidoqueen

tokens.description: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.
tokens.name: nidoran-m

tokens.description: An aggressive pokémon that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.
tokens.name: nidorino

tokens.description: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey's bones.
tokens.name: nidoking

tokens.description: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.
tokens.name: clefairy

tokens.description: A timid fairy pokémon that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.
tokens.name: clefable

tokens.description: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.
tokens.name: vulpix

tokens.description: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.
tokens.name: ninetales

tokens.description: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.
tokens.name: jigglypuff

tokens.description: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.
tokens.name: wigglytuff

tokens.description: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.
tokens.name: zubat

tokens.description: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.
tokens.name: golbat

tokens.description: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.
tokens.name: oddish

tokens.description: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.
tokens.name: gloom

tokens.description: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.
tokens.name: vileplume

tokens.description: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by drawing nutrients from the bug host.
tokens.name: paras

tokens.description: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.
tokens.name: parasect

tokens.description: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.
tokens.name: venonat

tokens.description: The dust-like scales covering its wings are color coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.
tokens.name: venomoth

tokens.description: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.
tokens.name: diglett

tokens.description: A team of diglett triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.
tokens.name: dugtrio

tokens.description: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
tokens.name: meowth

tokens.description: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.
tokens.name: persian

tokens.description: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily pokémon will use psychokinetic powers.
tokens.name: psyduck

tokens.description: Often seen swimming elegantly by lake shores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.
tokens.name: golduck

tokens.description: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.
tokens.name: mankey

tokens.description: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.
tokens.name: primeape

tokens.description: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.
tokens.name: growlithe

tokens.description: A pokémon that has been admired since the past for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.
tokens.name: arcanine

tokens.description: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.
tokens.name: poliwag

tokens.description: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.
tokens.name: poliwhirl

tokens.description: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breast stroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.
tokens.name: poliwrath

tokens.description: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and teleport to safety.
tokens.name: abra

tokens.description: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.
tokens.name: kadabra

tokens.description: Its brain can outperform a supercomputer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.
tokens.name: alakazam

tokens.description: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.
tokens.name: machop

tokens.description: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
tokens.name: machoke

tokens.description: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.
tokens.name: machamp

tokens.description: A carnivorous pokémon that traps and eats bugs. It uses its root feet to soak up needed moisture.
tokens.name: bellsprout

tokens.description: It spits out poison powder to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of acid.
tokens.name: weepinbell

tokens.description: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.
tokens.name: victreebel

tokens.description: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.
tokens.name: tentacool

tokens.description: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.
tokens.name: tentacruel

tokens.description: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.
tokens.name: geodude

tokens.description: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.
tokens.name: graveler

tokens.description: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without damage.
tokens.name: golem

tokens.description: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.
tokens.name: ponyta

tokens.description: Very competitive, this pokémon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.
tokens.name: rapidash

tokens.description: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.
tokens.name: slowpoke

tokens.description: The shellder that is latched onto slowpoke's tail is said to feed on the host's left over scraps.
tokens.name: slowbro

tokens.description: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses thunder wave and similar moves.
tokens.name: magnemite

tokens.description: Formed by several magnemites linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.
tokens.name: magneton

tokens.description: The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. It is used much like a metal sword.
tokens.name: farfetch’d

tokens.description: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints.
tokens.name: doduo

tokens.description: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.
tokens.name: dodrio

tokens.description: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick ice.
tokens.name: seel

tokens.description: Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.
tokens.name: dewgong

tokens.description: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.
tokens.name: grimer

tokens.description: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.
tokens.name: muk

tokens.description: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.
tokens.name: shellder

tokens.description: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.
tokens.name: cloyster

tokens.description: Almost invisible, this gaseous pokémon cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.
tokens.name: gastly

tokens.description: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.
tokens.name: haunter

tokens.description: Under a full moon, this pokémon likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.
tokens.name: gengar

tokens.description: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.
tokens.name: onix

tokens.description: Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.
tokens.name: drowzee

tokens.description: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of psi moves such as hypnosis and confusion.
tokens.name: hypno

tokens.description: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.
tokens.name: krabby

tokens.description: The large pincer has 10000 hp of crushing power. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.
tokens.name: kingler

tokens.description: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a pokéball, they have zapped many people.
tokens.name: voltorb

tokens.description: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.
tokens.name: electrode

tokens.description: Often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.
tokens.name: exeggcute

tokens.description: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an exeggcute.
tokens.name: exeggutor

tokens.description: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this pokémon's real face.
tokens.name: cubone

tokens.description: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.
tokens.name: marowak

tokens.description: When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. It runs smoothly with extra long, loping strides.
tokens.name: hitmonlee

tokens.description: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning fast volleys that are impossible to see.
tokens.name: hitmonchan

tokens.description: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon's. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.
tokens.name: lickitung

tokens.description: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.
tokens.name: koffing

tokens.description: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 koffings can fuse into a weezing over many years.
tokens.name: weezing

tokens.description: Its massive bones are 1000 times harder than human bones. It can easily knock a trailer flying.
tokens.name: rhyhorn

tokens.description: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees.
tokens.name: rhydon

tokens.description: A rare and elusive pokémon that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to get it.
tokens.name: chansey

tokens.description: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to seaweed. Its vines shake as it walks.
tokens.name: tangela

tokens.description: The infant rarely ventures out of its mother's protective pouch until it is 3 years old.
tokens.name: kangaskhan

tokens.description: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.
tokens.name: horsea

tokens.description: Capable of swimming backwards by rapidly flapping its wing-like pectoral fins and stout tail.
tokens.name: seadra

tokens.description: Its tail fin billows like an elegant ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of the Water Queen.
tokens.name: goldeen

tokens.description: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.
tokens.name: seaking

tokens.description: An enigmatic pokémon that can effortlessly regenerate any appendage it loses in battle.
tokens.name: staryu

tokens.description: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.
tokens.name: starmie

tokens.description: If interrupted while it is miming, it will slap around the offender with its broad hands.
tokens.name: mr. mime

tokens.description: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one.
tokens.name: scyther

tokens.description: It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.
tokens.name: jynx

tokens.description: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.
tokens.name: electabuzz

tokens.description: Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to hide perfectly among flames.
tokens.name: magmar

tokens.description: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing it around and toss it hard.
tokens.name: pinsir

tokens.description: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.
tokens.name: tauros

tokens.description: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.
tokens.name: magikarp

tokens.description: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.
tokens.name: gyarados

tokens.description: A pokémon that has been overhunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people across the water.
tokens.name: lapras

tokens.description: Capable of copying an enemy's genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.
tokens.name: ditto

tokens.description: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element stones.
tokens.name: eevee

tokens.description: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.
tokens.name: vaporeon

tokens.description: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10000-volt lightning bolts.
tokens.name: jolteon

tokens.description: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature could soar to over 1600 degrees.
tokens.name: flareon

tokens.description: A pokémon that consists entirely of programming code. Capable of moving freely in cyberspace.
tokens.name: porygon

tokens.description: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically resurrected from fossils.
tokens.name: omanyte

tokens.description: A prehistoric pokémon that died out when its heavy shell made it impossible to catch prey.
tokens.name: omastar

tokens.description: A pokémon that was resurrected from a fossil found in what was once the ocean floor eons ago.
tokens.name: kabuto

tokens.description: Its sleek shape is perfect for swimming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains the body fluids.
tokens.name: kabutops

tokens.description: A ferocious, prehistoric pokémon that goes for the enemy's throat with its serrated saw-like fangs.
tokens.name: aerodactyl

tokens.description: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.
tokens.name: snorlax

tokens.description: A legendary bird pokémon that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.
tokens.name: articuno

tokens.description: A legendary bird pokémon that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.
tokens.name: zapdos

tokens.description: Known as the legendary bird of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flash of flames.
tokens.name: moltres

tokens.description: Long considered a mythical pokémon until recently when a small colony was found living underwater.
tokens.name: dratini

tokens.description: A mystical pokémon that exudes a gentle aura. Has the ability to change climate conditions.
tokens.name: dragonair

tokens.description: An extremely rarely seen marine pokémon. Its intelligence is said to match that of humans.
tokens.name: dragonite

tokens.description: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering experiments.
tokens.name: mewtwo

tokens.description: So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. Only a few people have seen it worldwide.
tokens.name: mew
